channel.title: Need help bad, please read to help
channel.description: can somone help me to make it when you hit a statue of sara you get magic xp?

item.title: Need help bad, please read to help
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

alright, it would be this

case OBJECTID:
{
addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[LEV#HERE]), LEV#HERE);
startAnimation(ANIMATIONHERE);
sendMessage("MESSAGEHERE");
}
break;

tell me the #s and ill fill it in for you if you want, and i have an animation list if u want me to give u 1

Read full topic
